column9: I am taking this medication for a herniated disc in my lower back, L4-L5.  This incident has caused extreme pain to my back with pain radiation down my left leg. I have used this medication before approx. 3 years ago for a similar back injury and I also experienced profound positive effects; relief of pain. One other positive point is that it is inexpensive.  Thanks
